Package model

Class SaveLoadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.SaveLoadManager
  • public class SaveLoadManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is in charge of saving and loading information from files
    Author:
    PMC

      • loadGame

        public static org.json.JSONObject loadGame​(int option)
                                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        It loads the game at index option from the list of saved games
        Parameters:
        option - Index of the game to load
        Returns:
        Game at option in JSONObject format
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if option is out of bounds

      • removeFile

        public static boolean removeFile​(java.lang.String filename,
                                 java.lang.String path,
                                 java.lang.String defaultFile)
        It removes the file from the computer and the list
        Parameters:
        filename - File's path
        path - List of saved games
        defaultFile - Default file - file to ignore when updating the list
        Returns:
        true if the game was loaded successfully and false otherwise

      • removeGame

        public static void removeGame​(int option)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        It removes the game at index option from the list of saved games
        Parameters:
        option - Index of the game to load
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Could not delete the game, maybe option was out of bounds
